text:
@narendramodi Dear PM Sir 
We as citizens of this great nation feel safe under your leadership but in testing covid19 times the irresponsible attitude of some people needs to be dealt with more stringent decions by the concerned authorities.  Kindly get implimented stricter norms save nation.
